mapper.insert: insert into mkt_qst_quest_detail_rel (REL_CONF_ID, A_NAIRE_ID, A_QUESTION_ID, A_QST_DETAIL_ID, RSTR_TYPE, Z_NAIRE_ID, Z_QUESTION_ID, Z_QST_DETAIL_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{relConfId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aNaireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aQuestionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aQstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rstrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zNaireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zQuestionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zQstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update mkt_qst_quest_detail_rel set A_NAIRE_ID = #{aNaireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, A_QUESTION_ID = #{aQuestionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, A_QST_DETAIL_ID = #{aQstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RSTR_TYPE = #{rstrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Z_NAIRE_ID = #{zNaireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Z_QUESTION_ID = #{zQuestionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Z_QST_DETAIL_ID = #{zQstDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REL_CONF_ID = #{relConfId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select REL_CONF_ID, A_NAIRE_ID, A_QUESTION_ID, A_QST_DETAIL_ID, RSTR_TYPE, Z_NAIRE_ID, Z_QUESTION_ID, Z_QST_DETAIL_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_qst_quest_detail_rel where REL_CONF_ID = #{relConfId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
